fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Visit your target. Any visits against them will fail, including your own

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-This role specifically ignores Rule 22
-You may not use your ability until Night 5
-Since this ability causes a paradox, cause your target to be converted into a role that should be “impossible” to exist (as determined by the host)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Create a paradox then survive until the end of the game
